node.title: Spirit Fest - Mirage Mirage
node.description: Spirit Fest are Saya and Takashi Ueno (Tenniscoats), Markus Acher (The Notwist, Rayon), Cico Beck (Aloa Input, The Notwist) and Mat Fowler (Jam Money, Bons). their third album Mirage Mirage contains 14 beautiful tracks.
node.release: Mirage Mirage was released on Morr Music on May 15, 2020.
